programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Combining two of Channel 4s favourite shows means viewers get to play along, a plus for both quiz and comedy fans alike. Jimmy Carr hosts the famous words and numbers quiz, with team captains and guests playing against each other.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: This time the competition takes place in and around Crewe and Nantwich. First to host is hairdresser Mushgon Dadfar. Loud, proud and confident, Mushgons got high hopes for her Caribbean themed evening, but what will the guests make of Mushgons choice of zumba for entertainment - always a good idea after a heavy meal.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Second to host is 44-year-old housewife Pip Massey. As a lady who lunches and is quite used to entertaining, Pip has high expectations that all those years of practise will make her `glamorous evening a success.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Landscape gardener and joker of the pack Darren Leech is third to host in and around Crewe and Nantwich. Darren plans to wow his guests with fine food and lashings of his unique entertainment. The menu features smoked haddock and black pudding, and chicken pie; the entertainment includes big laughs at Darrens bottom.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Student Emma Davies is the fourth to host. As the baby of the group, Emma feels she is just the person to inject a bit of fun into the week with her shipwrecked dinner-party theme. Then theres her inventive stuffed pork recipe, a homemade gnocchi starter, but also a musical performance from the host.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The week of dining in and around Crewe and Nantwich is rounded off with hypnotherapist Russell Stubbss `British rock night. Will Russells great British produce be enough to convince his guests that he should win the £1,000?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The competition is in and around Essex, where first host is 46-year-old head teacher Corinna. She hopes her royal themed evening, regal cuisine and larger than life hosting be enough to win her the cash prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: Grace couldnt be happier after she marries the man of her dreams at his familys luxurious estate. Theres just one catch - she must now hide from midnight until dawn while her new in-laws hunt her down with guns, crossbows and other weapons. programme.title: Spartacus: Gods of the Arena
programme.desc: The prequel to `Spartacus: Blood and Sand tells the story of the original champion of the House of Batiatus, in a time when gladiators were more ruthless and every man was out for himself. While his father is away in Sicily, Batiatus gains temporary power of the house, but he isnt satisfied with the succession plan as currently constructed; hes poised to not only overthrow his father but also gain power and prestige in Capua. With his loyal and calculating wife, Lucretia, by his side, and his infamous gladiator Gannicus embracing his champion status, Batiatus ambitious schemes have no bounds.

programme.title: My Life at Christmas with Anita Rani
programme.desc: Anita delves into a lifetime of Christmas memories with actor Rudolph Walker CBE, best known for playing Patrick Trueman in EastEnders. His story takes him from a modest Trinidadian childhood to breaking theatrical boundaries in the UK, before achieving household fame in the now controversial sitcom Love Thy Neighbour.

programme.title: The Waltons Homecoming
programme.desc: The Walton family is excited to learn that John Sr. will be coming home for Christmas during the winter of 1933. However, when a storm threatens his arrival and hes nowhere to be found, John Boy embarks on a life-changing journey to find him.

programme.title: The Bear Family and Me
programme.desc: Gordon returns to Minnesota in early autumn to discover that the life of abandoned bear cub, Hope, has taken an unexpected turn for the better. Hope is back together with her mother Lily, but the bears are in danger when hunters move into the forest. Gordons role changes from cameraman to bodyguard as he walks with the bears to try to keep them safe.

programme.title: Witness for the Prosecution
programme.desc: A top-flight barrister attempts to defend murder suspect Leonard Vole, who stands accused of murdering a wealthy widow for the fortune she left behind. To make matters worse, his alibi, provided by his wife Christine, falls down when it is revealed their marriage is not fully legal and she can be used as a witness for the prosecution.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: Agent Harry Palmer is assigned to investigate a bizarre brain drain among scientists, and finds himself embroiled in a world of espionage where nobody can be trusted and nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: UK Championship Snooker LIVE
programme.desc: Live coverage from day 1 of the 2025 UK Snooker Championship.

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: The teams travel through the breathtaking beauty of Costa Rica, a country that contains five per cent of the worlds biodiversity, before reaching Panama, the seventh country of the race.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The team are at Stockport Town Hall in Greater Manchester, and Paul Martin is joined by experts Mark Stacey and Philip Serrell. Philip spots a pair of charcoal drawings by Northern artist Trevor Grimshaw and Mark spies some gold European coins. Paul also takes time out to visit Manchester Art Gallery to admire the work of Pre-Raphaelite artist Ford Madox Brown.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Celebrated radio broadcasters and good mates Mark Radcliffe and Edith Bowman put down their mics and battle it out to pick up some profit-making collectables and curios. Antiques experts Paul Martin and Natasha Raskin Sharp are along for the ride.

programme.title: Boxing LIVE
programme.desc: Live coverage of a boxing match.

programme.title: TOTP 2
programme.desc: Fast moving music show mixing todays hits with classic performances from the `Top of the Pops archives.

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Welcome to this celebration of big hits performed at Top of the Pops on or close to the Christmas show on suitably seasonal sets. Tis the season to be jolly and its not only actual Christmas-themed hits that recall the ghost of Christmases past but all the songs we bought and loved in Decembers past.

programme.title: Mariah Meets Rylan
programme.desc: A celebration of the queen of Christmas and one of the greatest voices of all time, Mariah Carey. Rylan is in Los Angeles for an intimate and exclusive sit-down with Mariah to mark 30 years since the release of All I Want for Christmas.

programme.title: UK Championship Snooker

programme.desc: Krusty comes close to Homer-cide after Homer gives him a bad TV review. He hides in a circus, but soon finds he is the centre of attention.

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In south Wales, beautician Rachael and her partner Nick take a risk by cooking dishes theyve never made before, and Ameel shows off his powers of memory recall.

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Some extra brunch as Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer host the food and chat show.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
Cheers
programme.desc: Coach falls in love and proposes to a woman he has never seen before, while Sam strikes out with her daughter.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: The gang is furious when Irene dumps Coach after she wins the lottery, but when Coach refuses to believe that Irene is really gone, everyone worries that hes living in a state of denial.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Diane meets Frasiers mother, who quietly threatens to kill Diane if she doesnt leave him alone.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Nick returns and demands of Carla a more equitable division of their marital property: namely him getting custody of one of their kids, a demand to which Carla agrees.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: When Debra discovers that Ray taped over their wedding video with the SuperBowl, he must go to extreme lengths to make it up to her.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray helps Ally obtain a Pokemon-style trading card, a `Hackidu, which is all the rage with the kids in school.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The passing of their least favourite aunt sees Frasier and Niles inspired to help Dad make his dream come true: finishing writing a song for Frank Sinatra.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Kate decides that Bulldog is just fine with all the pranks hes playing on Frasier, despite Dr Cranes obvious discomfort. In fact she encourages Frasier to retaliate, and thats when he gets the idea to use a lizard in a prize draw.

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Presenters Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer mix a cookery show with a chat show, where they cook in the kitchen and are accompanied by the weeks celebrity guest.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Simpsons holiday at Niagara Falls, where Marge must rescue Lisa when a mix-up sees her mistakenly granted asylum in Canada. Elsewhere, Homer takes Maggie to a `Daddy and Me class.

programme.title: Were Going on a Bear Hunt
programme.desc: Following the Intrepid adventures of siblings Stan, Katie, Rosie, Max, the baby and Rufus the dog, who decide one day to `catch a big one and set off on an expedition in search of bears.

programme.title: Terry Pratchetts The Abominable Snow Baby
programme.desc: A small town is thrown into disarray by the unexpected appearance of a 14-foot snow monster. The creature is rescued by the indomitable Granny and her grandson Albert, but not everyone is happy with the new arrangement.

programme.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
programme.desc: A young girl named Sophie invites an anthropomorphised tiger over for an intimate tea party. He proceeds to drink all the tea and eat all the food.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great New Year Bake Off
programme.desc: Some familiar faces from Bake Off past battle it out over three seasonal challenges to see who will win the first Star Baker crown of 2023. And then to see the New Year in, the bakers and their family and friends are entertained by Riverdance.

programme.title: Inside McVities at Christmas
programme.desc: We lift the lid on McVities as they take on the competitive Christmas biscuit market. And its crunch time for the new white chocolate digestive. Will it be a hit?

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver brings festive flair to his gnarly fare. He makes cheesy filo parcels with a tangy cranberry dip, and festive-spiced root veg paired with the perfect combo of chicken, sausage and bacon party kebabs.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares a zingy smoked trout pâte with red cabbage slaw and a giant Yorkshire pudding, and creates a veggie extravaganza with his cracking Christmas cauliflower lasagne.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: A Very British Hotel
programme.desc: Browns, Londons oldest luxury hotel, invites viewers behind the scenes for the very first time as it gears up for its busiest and most magical season.

programme.title: Game of Wool: Britains Best Knitter
programme.desc: For Texture Week, the solo challenge demands ultra-realistic amigurumi food so lifelike that it looks good enough to eat. Then, split into three teams, the contestants must collaborate to create the ultimate textured slouchy cardigan.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: All eyes will be on the first corner of this demanding circuit. But the big question is, will the drivers championship be decided here or at an explosive finale in Abu Dhabi?

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an elite assassin who becomes the target of a mysterious operative who can seemingly predict his every move. To his horror, he soon learns that the man whos trying to kill him is a younger, faster, cloned version of himself.

programme.title: Ramsays Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in to the River Rock Inn in Milford, Pennsylvania. Owner Ken Pisciotta is in over his head and drowning in debt and unable to get any guests to stay in his neglected establishment.

programme.title: Tevar
programme.desc: A kabaddi player dose all he can to saves a young woman from an unwanted marriage by hiding her in his house.

programme.title: Fire Man: Surya
programme.desc: Five childhood friends, who aspire to join the fire department, find themselves in a tight spot when one of them accidentally kills a local goons henchman.

programme.title: Dear Zindagi
programme.desc: An unconventional thinker helps a budding cinematographer gain a new perspective on life.

programme.title: Deewane Huye Paagal
programme.desc: Tanya witnesses the murder of an acclaimed scientist by his evil twin brother and must flee the country, chased by the mob, as well as a number of suitors.

programme.title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
programme.desc: After the wedding ceremony between Surinder Sahni and Taani, Surinder discovers that his new wife cares little for him. When she decides to enter a dance competition, Surinder disguises himself, joins the class and tries to befriend her. Taani soon falls in love with her new dance partner, Raj, unaware that he is in fact her husband.

programme.title: Rocky Aur Rani Ki Prem Kahani
programme.desc: Flamboyant Punjabi Rocky and intellectual Bengali journalist Rani fall in love despite their differences. After facing family opposition, they decide to live with each others relatives for three months before getting married.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: A chaos of relationships and interchanging couples and a pursuit for diamonds.

programme.title: I Love You
programme.desc: Santosh, a carefree youth, parts ways with his lover, Dharmika, during his college days. Years later, after his marriage to Gowri, he runs into her, which leaves him in a dilemma.

programme.title: Noyontara
programme.desc: Noyontara, a 23-year-old ghost-whisperer has always lived on the fringes, ridiculed for her rare gift. Her life takes a drastic turn when she marries Surjo, a man of science and reason.

programme.desc: Aarohi has one month to find her dream husband, and she sees her Mr Perfect in Abhishek, but will her `Manpasand marriage story be successful?

programme.title: Key and Peele
programme.desc: Sketches include Freddy Wong being a creepy ghost roommate, the guys looking at the bright side of being tortured, and Keegan meeting a house full of sexy vampires.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: National treasure Miranda Hart bravely gives Michael her phone in Celebrity Send To All, and theres music from global pop megastar Niall Horan. Plus, an AandE doctor is fooled into thinking the theatre is actually a grand hotel in the most ambitious Unexpected Star surprise ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where No Ones Ready
programme.desc: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica decides the best way to get over Richard is to keep herself busy. She develops a `jam plan, hoping the distraction of cooking will divert her attention. After making jars and jars of jam Monica decides she still wants to have a baby, so she begins searching for a sperm donor, and comes across Joeys file. Elsewhere, Phoebe is mistakenly stalked by a man who thinks shes Ursula, and Chandler receives dating advice.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: National treasure Miranda Hart bravely gives Michael her phone in Celebrity Send To All, and theres music from global pop megastar Niall Horan. Plus, an AandE doctor is fooled into thinking the theatre is actually a grand hotel in the most ambitious Unexpected Star surprise ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss New Girlfriend
programme.desc: Ross comes back from China with his new girlfriend Julie, and Rachel has a really hard time dealing with it. She winds up sleeping with Paolo and hates herself for it. Joey persuades her to tell Ross how she feels, but when Ross tells her he is in love with Julie, she cant bring herself to do it.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Breast Milk
programme.desc: While Carol and Susan are away, Ross and the friends babysit his newborn son Ben, but Ross is disgusted when Phoebe tests the temperature of some bottled breast milk on her wrist. Meanwhile, Joey competes with a fellow cologne salesman.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When downstairs neighbour Mr Heckles dies, the friends clean out his apartment, but Chandler becomes convinced his hyper-critical nature will mean he ends up alone and sad, just like Heckles.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is surprised when Phoebes husband - a gay Canadian ice dancer - shows up, as nobody knew she was married. Elsewhere, Chandler reveals his third nipple, and Ross new relationship is under attack, unbeknown to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Five Steaks and an Eggplant
programme.desc: Monica gets promoted and invites the friends out for dinner to celebrate, but problems arise when the difference in their salaries becomes apparent and the group splits in two. Meanwhile, when Chandler sets a woman up to get a date with her, a case of mistaken identities means that he discovers what she really thought of him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Baby on the Bus
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler babysit Ben, who turns out to be a babe-magnet until they accidentally leave him on a bus. Meanwhile, Phoebe loses her job as the singer at Central Perk to Stephanie.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Finds Out
programme.desc: Ross and Julie announce they are getting a cat together, while Rachel gets drunk on a date and all she talks about is Ross. She decides to get closure by calling him and telling his machine she is over him. Meanwhile, Chandler regrets asking Monica to help him lose weight.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross agonises over whether he should stay with Julie or date Rachel. The gang encourage him to compare the two, so he starts with a list of Rachels negative qualities. Unfortunately, Rachel sees the list.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey gets a great acting opportunity on `Days of our Lives, Rachel dates a guy called Russ who is amazingly similar to Ross, and Monica renews her relationship with `Fun Bobby, but finds out Bobby is only fun when he is drinking.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Lesbian Wedding
programme.desc: Rachels free-spirited mother visits and reveals that she wants to end her marriage and experiment sexually. Meanwhile, Carol and Susan prepare for their wedding, with some help from an uncomfortable Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Joey starts dating a fan who is gorgeous, but soon discovers that shes also quite mad. Meanwhile, Ross is reminded how much he misses Marcel his old pet monkey, and travels to San Diego Zoo to find out what has happened to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Ross finally spends some time with Marcel after many false starts, and Chandler is delighted to get a date with the sexy Susie, who he hasnt seen since fourth grade. However, she gets her revenge for youthful humiliation by leaving him in the loo, naked but for a pair of her knickers.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Prom Video
programme.desc: When Monicas parents clear out her old room to install a gym, they unearth an old video of her and Rachels first prom night. Its obvious from this that Ross is in love with Rachel and, having told him it will never happen, Rachel changes her mind. Elsewhere, Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet as a token of his friendship and is mortally offended to hear Chandler saying how terrible it is.

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A research scientist becomes the worlds first pregnant man in order to test a drug he and a colleague have designed for expectant women. To carry out the trial, he has an embryo implant, believing that he will only carry the baby for three months - hardly expecting to face the prospect of giving birth.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: National treasure Miranda Hart bravely gives Michael her phone in Celebrity Send To All, and theres music from global pop megastar Niall Horan. Plus, an AandE doctor is fooled into thinking the theatre is actually a grand hotel in the most ambitious Unexpected Star surprise ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel ... You Know
programme.desc: Among the guests at Monicas party is a handsome and sophisticated doctor, but the only problem is that hes old enough to be her father. Meanwhile, Joey buys a big screen TV and two reclining leather armchairs with the money from his `Days of Our Lives contract.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
programme.desc: Everyone at Monicas dads birthday party finds it amusing that their middle-aged friend, eye-doctor Richard Burke, is dating a woman in her 20s - until Monicas parents learn that it is their daughter. Meanwhile, Chandler and Joey row over a dirty spoon. Is the apartment still big enough for both of them?

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
programme.desc: With Joey in his new apartment, Chandler gets a troublesome new flatmate, Eddie. Meanwhile, Phoebe makes a video for `Smelly Cat, and Ross and Monica find it nearly impossible to live together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Dr Ramoray Dies
programme.desc: Joeys remarks to a fan magazine could cause him to lose his job playing Dr Ramoray on a daytime television drama, and Chandlers new flatmate Eddie becomes too annoying to cope with.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.desc: Something strange is afoot in Sherwood Forest when Robin Hood and his very merry men poke fun at all things green and scarlet in this parody. Robin and his gang have to fight evil Prince John while King Richard is off on a crusade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of a group of foul-mouthed elementary school boys in South Park, Colorado. The students, including, Eric Cartman, Stan Marsh, Kyle Broflovski and Kenny McCormick target every conceivable group in outrageous ways.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: With Reginald D Hunter, Rachel Riley, Josh Widdicombe and Gemma Collins,.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: Love Lies and a Buffet Surprise
programme.desc: ...A******? Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix put pettiness under the microscope, incl. a woman who lied about her age to a partner and a mums extreme response to her daughters mess.

programme.title: Dara OBriain Talks Funny: Live in London
programme.desc: Recorded at the world famous Hammersmith Apollo before 3,300 fans, this is the culmination of Daras massive 2008 sellout tour of the UK and Ireland. Dara is at his best, mixing top drawer material with lightning-fast improvisation to give his audience yet another hilarious night to remember.

programme.title: Tom Allen Absolutely Live
programme.desc: Tom Allens unique style of sharp, acerbic wit and camp, riotous storytelling recorded live at his spiritual home, the world-famous London Palladium.

programme.desc: Ross agonises over whether he should stay with Julie or date Rachel. The gang encourage him to compare the two, so he starts with a list of Rachels negative qualities. Unfortunately, Rachel sees the list.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey gets a great acting opportunity on `Days of our Lives, Rachel dates a guy called Russ who is amazingly similar to Ross, and Monica renews her relationship with `Fun Bobby, but finds out Bobby is only fun when he is drinking.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Lesbian Wedding
programme.desc: Rachels free-spirited mother visits and reveals that she wants to end her marriage and experiment sexually. Meanwhile, Carol and Susan prepare for their wedding, with some help from an uncomfortable Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Joey starts dating a fan who is gorgeous, but soon discovers that shes also quite mad. Meanwhile, Ross is reminded how much he misses Marcel his old pet monkey, and travels to San Diego Zoo to find out what has happened to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Ross finally spends some time with Marcel after many false starts, and Chandler is delighted to get a date with the sexy Susie, who he hasnt seen since fourth grade. However, she gets her revenge for youthful humiliation by leaving him in the loo, naked but for a pair of her knickers.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Prom Video
programme.desc: When Monicas parents clear out her old room to install a gym, they unearth an old video of her and Rachels first prom night. Its obvious from this that Ross is in love with Rachel and, having told him it will never happen, Rachel changes her mind. Elsewhere, Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet as a token of his friendship and is mortally offended to hear Chandler saying how terrible it is.

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A research scientist becomes the worlds first pregnant man in order to test a drug he and a colleague have designed for expectant women. To carry out the trial, he has an embryo implant, believing that he will only carry the baby for three months - hardly expecting to face the prospect of giving birth.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: National treasure Miranda Hart bravely gives Michael her phone in Celebrity Send To All, and theres music from global pop megastar Niall Horan. Plus, an AandE doctor is fooled into thinking the theatre is actually a grand hotel in the most ambitious Unexpected Star surprise ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel ... You Know
programme.desc: Among the guests at Monicas party is a handsome and sophisticated doctor, but the only problem is that hes old enough to be her father. Meanwhile, Joey buys a big screen TV and two reclining leather armchairs with the money from his `Days of Our Lives contract.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
programme.desc: Everyone at Monicas dads birthday party finds it amusing that their middle-aged friend, eye-doctor Richard Burke, is dating a woman in her 20s - until Monicas parents learn that it is their daughter. Meanwhile, Chandler and Joey row over a dirty spoon. Is the apartment still big enough for both of them?

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
programme.desc: With Joey in his new apartment, Chandler gets a troublesome new flatmate, Eddie. Meanwhile, Phoebe makes a video for `Smelly Cat, and Ross and Monica find it nearly impossible to live together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Dr Ramoray Dies
programme.desc: Joeys remarks to a fan magazine could cause him to lose his job playing Dr Ramoray on a daytime television drama, and Chandlers new flatmate Eddie becomes too annoying to cope with.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.desc: Something strange is afoot in Sherwood Forest when Robin Hood and his very merry men poke fun at all things green and scarlet in this parody. Robin and his gang have to fight evil Prince John while King Richard is off on a crusade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of a group of foul-mouthed elementary school boys in South Park, Colorado. The students, including, Eric Cartman, Stan Marsh, Kyle Broflovski and Kenny McCormick target every conceivable group in outrageous ways.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: With Reginald D Hunter, Rachel Riley, Josh Widdicombe and Gemma Collins,.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: Love Lies and a Buffet Surprise
programme.desc: ...A******? Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix put pettiness under the microscope, incl. a woman who lied about her age to a partner and a mums extreme response to her daughters mess.

programme.title: Dara OBriain Talks Funny: Live in London
programme.desc: Recorded at the world famous Hammersmith Apollo before 3,300 fans, this is the culmination of Daras massive 2008 sellout tour of the UK and Ireland. Dara is at his best, mixing top drawer material with lightning-fast improvisation to give his audience yet another hilarious night to remember.

programme.title: Tom Allen Absolutely Live
programme.desc: Tom Allens unique style of sharp, acerbic wit and camp, riotous storytelling recorded live at his spiritual home, the world-famous London Palladium.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.sub-title: Home Sweet Homestead: Safer at Home-stead
programme.desc: The Raney family turns cameras on themselves as they shelter in place on their Alaskan homestead. When a moose kill is discovered dangerously close to their cabin, Marty attempts to track the predators.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: The team run into trouble whilst tracking a massive animal in the middle of the night. Russell hopes to find clues that explain the anomaly on his thermal scan.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Russell uses an unlikely ally to pursue a strange predator. Meanwhile, Bryce investigates the teams recent encounters with some mysterious floating orbs. Plus, Ronny and Mireya use the technology to track down a creature in the woods.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: The team is hot on the trail of Bigfoot using new tracking technology, but a chilling new revelation about the creatures psychic abilities may complicate the investigation. Mireya is startled by strangle lights in the night.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: A visibly shaken Ronny and Mireya want answers about the unexplained activity they encountered the night before, while Bryce is baffled by strange lights on the security camera. The expedition takes a turn when a team member goes missing.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: The team pulls out all the stops to corner Bigfoot, while Mireya travels on horseback to find evidence. Ronny recruits a psychic specialist to hone in on the creature, and Russell catches sight of what could be real proof of Bigfoot.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: When Russell films a shocking piece of video evidence, the whole team assembles in order to follow the trail together. In the end, their search ends up culminating in a monumental discovery.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Four gold dredges and their driven but eccentric crews risk everything to hunt for gold on the bottom of the frigid Bering Sea before winter sets in. They rely on custom-built rigs, some barely seaworthy, for their perilous journeys.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Tensions rise as the mining season hits its midpoint. The Kellys launch the All-In, and Zeke hits the cheese. But Shawn struggles to find a pay streak, and an alleged claim jumper sets up on the Tomcod Claim hotspot.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Tensions rise as the mining season hits its midpoint. The Kellys launch the All-In, and Zeke hits the cheese. But Shawn struggles to find a pay streak, and an alleged claim jumper sets up on the Tomcod Claim hotspot.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Tensions explode on the Tomcod Claim; Chris takes radical action against a dredge he believes is jumping his claim; when a massive explosion blows a hole in the Mistress, Kris scrambles to save his livelihood.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Tensions explode on the Tomcod Claim; Chris takes radical action against a dredge he believes is jumping his claim; when a massive explosion blows a hole in the Mistress, Kris scrambles to save his livelihood.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Four gold dredges and their driven but eccentric crews risk everything to hunt for gold on the bottom of the frigid Bering Sea before winter sets in. They rely on custom-built rigs, some barely seaworthy, for their perilous journeys.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: To make up for lost profits, Jared takes a huge gamble on bringing two valuable pieces of machinery back to life after decades of neglect. Handfallers Jim and Rob go toe-to-toe with a giant cedar that threatens to shut down the entire operation.

programme.title: The Woodland Workshop
programme.desc: The team take on three ambitious timber projects that test their skills to the limit. Alex creates a unique hammock, and Robin builds a bike storage rack.

programme.title: Expedition From Hell: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: Mickey Grosman, an adventurer, sends a group of aspiring survivalists on an impossible journey across South America.

programme.title: In the Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: Hundreds of cameras capture a rare tornado outbreak in 2023 as it struck Rolling Fork, Mississippi and Little Rock, Arkansas; when a twister hits Lewistown, Illinois, a group of tornado spotters find themselves trapped in the eye of the deadly storm.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Heather and Phil sniff out the trail of a vampiric Chupacabra said to be terrorising eastern Texas. Joined by a new high-tech hound, can their robot companion help them catch this Badlands bloodsucker in the act?

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Josh and Heather investigate Spike Island, Irelands most brutal prison, after hearing shocking paranormal claims from visitors and former inmates. Have centuries of torture and death caused the islands spirits to finally break free?

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: As the Raneys scramble to ready their 40-acre homestead for winter, Marty gets an urgent SOS call from a fellow Alaskan. A tragic plane crash has destroyed access to his homestead across a treacherous river, and hes dangerously unprepared.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Brittany is hurt before a major school event, Jeanette fills in as the Principals assistant. When Bocarters father helps him with his class project, Alvin enlists Daves help, locking the families in a heated competition.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: School Alone; It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: Alvin and Brittany get stuck alone at the school with a ghost they think roams the halls. Alvin passes off a rock he found on the ground as a meteor for a science project and gets some unwanted attention.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin accuses Dave of yelling at him too much, a therapist moves in to help Dave control his anger. When the school digs up an old high school time capsule, Miss Smith and Dave work together to keep an old secret.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvins too short to ride a new amusement park ride; while on a ski trip, Alvin convinces Theodore theres a Yeti nearby.

programme.sub-title: Run Aimee Run; Theo vs. Simon
programme.desc: The Munks help a world-famous runner design a pair of prosthetic legs for a race shes set to run in. Theodore embarks on a quest to find one thing he can do better than Simon, and he quickly realises it wont be easy.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When an accident forces Simon to wear his old glasses, he becomes the target of the school bully. So Simon builds a homemade robot bodyguard!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave is working on an important new song for the music festival, but the Chipmunks accidentally ruin it. Can they fix it in time for the big performance?

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: A Room of Ones Own; Carts and Crafts
programme.desc: Alvin convinces Dave to give him his own room; after Alvin inadvertently destroys Theodores bike, he enters the boys in a round up of shopping carts where the first prize is a new bike.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: I Will Survive; Alvins Got a Brand New Bag
programme.desc: When Alvin gets hurt, Simon agrees to face off against Derek on a survival reality show; Alvin accidentally ruins Brittanys favourite bag and must come up with a way to replace it.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin sneaks into Simons lab to look at his latest invention, only to accidentally clone himself. With two Alvins, theres double the trouble. Alvin tells a small lie that quickly turns into a huge disaster, dragging everyone into his tangled web.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Chipmunks take in a stray dog, but have to keep the puppy hidden from Dave, who wont allow pets.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin gets a device that lets him listen in on everyones conversations. When is too much information, too much?

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin and Brittany are convinced Simon has vanished back in time and go all out in an attempt to bring him back. A prank call by Alvin gets out of hand when the person on the other end of the line vows to track him down.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Simon is alarmed to discover that he has been tagging private property in his sleep. Alvins luck goes from bad to worse after Theodore finds a four-leaf clover and everything starts going his way.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin thinks Theodores teddy bear can tell the future, Alvin goes all out to make Talking Teddy his friend. Alvin lies to Theodore about a fake holiday to get out of chores, so Dave forces Alvin to make the holiday real.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: Theos Big Night Out; The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Theodore tries to overcome his fear of sleepovers by spending the night at Kevins house without Alvin or Simon. Plus, when Alvin sees every celebrity with their own personal bodyguard, he decides to train Theodore for the job.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin talks Dave into buying a used tour bus, Dave has no idea of the problems ahead. Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.sub-title: Between a Rope and a Hard Place/ World Day
programme.desc: Coach Dobkins kicks Cheesy and Theodore off the track team for being slow.

programme.sub-title: Sick as a Chipmunk; Instant Gram

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: In an effort to be more productive, Simon invents a device that can override the need to sleep; Alvin gets a taste of his own medicine when he zaps Dave with a youth ray, turning him into an irresponsible teen.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittany hastily enters a skateboard contest against a skate park bully even though she has no clue how to ride; complaints rise as Simons robot Geizmo goes around town dismantling washing machines.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Theodore is passed over when Alvin and Eleanor train as lifeguards; Miss Croners cherries are lost.

programme.sub-title: To Serve and Protect; Kickin It Old School

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave finds himself in school with Alvin after he discovers that he never graduated from high school; Simons new friend decides to ditch him to spend time with Alvin.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittany takes up painting to impress her fashion idol, but her idol only likes her art after Alvin ruins it; Alvin is convinced that Julie and her son are trying to move in to their home, so he tries to stop the invasion.

programme.sub-title: Alvins Wild Weekend/For Whom the Bell Tolls
programme.desc: Alvin begs Dave to spend a weekend alone with him. Dave agrees and gets sucked into a series of wild Alvin adventures. A hypnotist accidentally turns Simon into a bumbling fool before hes scheduled to participate in an academic contest.

programme.sub-title: Were the Chipmunks; Save the Dance

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The chipmunks help an owner fix up his run-down summer camp and his broken relationship with his brother. Alvin believes that Theodore cursed him so that he can never lie again and cannot help himself from blabbing the truth.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Theodore gives Dave an ugly handmade vest for his birthday and insists he wear it to an upcoming business meeting. When Theodore finds a winning lottery ticket, everyone has their own ideas on how the money should be spent.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave gets temporary amnesia so the boys trick him into letting them skip school and go on a ski trip instead. Theodore becomes obsessed with cleanliness after a speaker at school talks to the class about the danger of germs.

programme.desc: Theodore must prove hes got the right stuff when the Chipmunks and Chipettes head off to space camp. Theodore burns his tongue on some super-hot chocolate and loses his sense of taste.

programme.desc: To land the lead role in a play, Alvin wagers Brittany that he can remain in character as a shoe cobbler. When Brittany becomes convinced shes a long-lost princess, she carries her new royal status a little too far.

They are soon carried away by the good weather, Phil dons his shorts and Irita runs away to Great Yarmouth to join the circus. The worlds first radar station is on Phils itinerary, and on the antiques radar theres everything from a garden fountain to a homemade post box. Finally, they swap the flash wheels for some vintage bubble cars as their purchases go under the hammer.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Irita Marriott and Phil Serrell are on a tour of Norfolk and Lincolnshire for their second outing together. Phil makes improper use of the classic car, believing its perfectly equipped to keep a bacon sandwich hot.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Irita and Phil journey north to Yorkshire in their fabulous gold Aston Martin, and this time Phil isnt the only passenger. Teaware enthusiast Irita is keen to continue her winning streak and prove shes not one cup short of a full set, while Phil steps up his game with a ladder. Dedicated follower of fashion Irita finds out about haute couture, 1890s Hull-style, and suave sophisticate Phil is turned into a pumpkin.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Irita and Phil tour County Durham, where Phil tries to shape up by pumping iron in the form of a water feature, while Irita goes clubbing Edwardian-style. Phil has a bash at organ restoration, and Irita takes a trip back to the heyday of British seaside holidays at Whitley Bays Spanish City. They trawl the emporia of the north east from Barnard Castle to Newcastle-upon-Tyne, having challenged each other to spend all their money.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Irita Marriott and Phil Serrell have arrived in Northumberland on the last leg of their tour, where Phil takes a punt on an antique pump for the second time before coming face to face with a scarecrow made in his own image. Irita takes a painterly turn, fancying a French work of art, and goes back to school Pre-Raphaelite-style in the model village of Ford, where she follows in the footsteps of little-known artist Lady Louisa Waterford.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: In Scotland, upcycler extraordinaire Sarah Moore is rummaging the rubbish at Wallyford Recycling Centre. With three items saved from the skip, Sarah turns to woodworking wonder Norman Wilkinson to give a redundant cable drum a new lease of life.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Upcycler extraordinaire EJ Osborne is scouring the skips at Woking Recycling Centre, assisted by trusty artisans Sarah Peterson and Bruce Faulseit. A dull dresser is given some makeover magic by Sarah, and Bruce transforms a pair of lounge doors.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Sarah Moore is at Witley recycling centre in search of tired and unwanted items she can transform from skip-bound to stylish. With three items saved, Sarah turns to design duo Josh and Oli to repurpose an old mower, while upholsterer Leigh-Anne Treadwell goes out on a limb with her redesign of a pair of teak chairs. Sarahs challenge is to find new homes for three Persian rugs, but will her eclectic items prove to be too past-it to make a profit?

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen pool their talents and resources to restore heirlooms and treasured antiques, such as music boxes, vases and clocks, to prove that anything can be restored to its former glory.

programme.desc: Spine-chilling series in which paranormal investigators help families reclaim their homes from unwelcome spirits. The team investigates Chillingham Castles bloody history.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Three paranormal investigators travel the UK to help families reclaim their homes from unwelcome spirits. The team are at The Leopard Inn, a historic hotel with hidden secrets.

programme.desc: George Princey has a high standing in the community. So when his daughter kills a man, George endeavours to cover it up to avoid facing a scandal.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Having arranged the death of her very wealthy husband in order to be with her lover Stephen, Olivia becomes increasingly annoyed by his lack of appreciation.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Jack and Ednas pet parrot dies after laying an unusually large egg. On hatching, it reveals an aggressive black-feathered bird, spelling immediate trouble.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.sub-title: I Like It Here in Wilmington
programme.desc: When a clothing manufacturer finds himself on the verge of bankruptcy, he ponders the idea of murdering his wife for the insurance money.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Steve and Jane are con artists who gain access to peoples homes claiming to be doing research into polish. But eventually, they meet their match.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: An executive (Howard Duff) plans to end an associates (Dan Dailey) love affair and save the mans career and marriage.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: A suspicious sergeant (William Conrad) digs when a death is labelled accidental. With David Wayne.

programme.title: The Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: The story of Maria Vargas, a Spanish peasant who, thanks to her beauty, rocketed to fame as a movie star. Told in flashback at her funeral, film director Harry Dawes recalls discovering her, PR Oscar Muldoon remembers how she was wooed and then abandoned by Alberto Bravano, and her husband Count Vincenzo Torlato-Favrini recounts how his world crumbled after he revealed a secret.

programme.title: Discovering Romance on Film
programme.desc: Film critics Ian Nathan, Bonnie Greer, Neil Norman and Stephen Armstrong come together to discuss their favourite romance movies of all time, including Casablanca and Coming to America.

programme.desc: Artists from across the UK and Ireland compete in a battle of skill as they attempt to produce portraits of famous sitters. The winner will receive a £10,000 prize, along with their winning portrait being hung in a famous cultural institution.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: One mans brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after its revealed hes a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseus travels the underworld to defeat the evil god Hades, who seeks to overthrow Zeus and bring hell to Earth.

programme.title: Wrath of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseus enlists the aid of Queen Andromeda, Hephaestus and Poseidons son to rescue Zeus from the underworld, defeat the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Pos homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lungs evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friends girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he wont let her go that easily.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Thriller about a photojournalist on board a destroyer, the Bedford, commanded by Captain Finlander. When the ship discovers a Soviet sub in Greenlands territorial waters, the Captain begins a relentless pursuit that pushes his crew to breaking point.

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: Jim Hardy quits showbiz to run a farm with dance partner Linda Mason, but she stays on stage to pair up with Ted Hanover. A romantic merry-go-round with a spring in its step and a medley of favourite seasonal tunes by Irving Berlin.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywoods move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: The days leading up to the tragedy of President John F. Kennedys assassination and its immediate aftermath are chronicled as they were experienced by the First Lady, wife of the charismatic president and mother of two small children.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss childrens book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter cant seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Too
programme.desc: A wisecracking toddler deals with toilet training, bickering parents and a baby sister in this sequel to the 1989 hit.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.
