programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Too
programme.desc: A wisecracking toddler deals with toilet training, bickering parents and a baby sister in this sequel to the 1989 hit.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Burning an Illusion
programme.desc: A young British-born black woman begins to question her attitude to love and life, and her desire for middle-class respectability and security through marriage.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: A master of disguise falls in love with the brilliant scientist who developed a valuable formula he was hired to steal.

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: Tongue-in-cheek tale about a high-speed car chase across America involving a sheriff and a bootlegger with crash stunts galore. All goes well for the Bandit as he drives from Texas to Georgia with a truckload of illicit beer until he stops to pick up a damsel in distress, who also happens to be the sheriffs daughter.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A glamorous career woman loses control when her married lover, a Manhattan attorney, ends their brief affair. Unable to accept his rejection, she pursues him at the office, and then at his home, eventually drawing his wife and daughter into the confrontation.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: A master of disguise falls in love with the brilliant scientist who developed a valuable formula he was hired to steal.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A glamorous career woman loses control when her married lover, a Manhattan attorney, ends their brief affair. Unable to accept his rejection, she pursues him at the office, and then at his home, eventually drawing his wife and daughter into the confrontation.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: A master of disguise falls in love with the brilliant scientist who developed a valuable formula he was hired to steal.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock is trying to take down Carlton Drake, the notorious and brilliant founder of the Life Foundation. While investigating one of Drakes experiments, Eddies body merges with the alien Venom -- leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: Stuck in a bizarre relationship with her dead, wisecracking Army pal, a veteran reunites with her solitary grandfather at his lake house.

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A serious TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mum. As he embraces positive holiday stories, romance blooms - but a career opportunity forces him to choose between ambition and love.

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A young writer travels to the remote compound of a legendary pop star who mysteriously disappeared 30 years ago. Surrounded by a cult of sycophants and intoxicated journalists, she soon finds herself in the middle of his twisted plan.

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: Exploring an abandoned visitor centre, Clover and her friends encounter a masked killer who murders them one by one. However, when they mysteriously wake up at the beginning of the same night, theyre forced to relive the terror over and over again.

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: A disposable employee is sent on a human expedition to colonize the ice world Niflheim. After one iteration dies, a new body is regenerated with most of his memories intact.

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: Violet is a widowed mother who goes to a restaurant to meet Henry, her charming and handsome date. However, she soon receives phone messages from a mysterious, hooded figure who threatens to kill her young son and sister unless she kills Henry.

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: A mans quiet life gets upended when a UFO crashes in his backyard in rural Pennsylvania. As he befriends the mysterious extraterrestrial, things start to get complicated when two neighbours discover it and the government quickly closes in.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.desc: Nothing is what it seems when a twisted one-night stand spirals into a serial killers vicious murder spree.

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his American wife Carol and children Nora and Lucas to Norway where hes inherited a family estate. There, Lucas discovers a mischievous barn elf from ancient folklore living in the barn who elf plots to get rid of the American intruders.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.title: Antebellum
programme.desc: A successful author finds herself in a horrifying reality and must figure out the mystery behind it before it is too late.

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders unravels a web of small-town lies while investigating the bizarre murders of two women with the same name. He meets and quickly falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour whos eager to help solve the mystery.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A driven young man named Lou stumbles upon the underground world of Los Angeles freelance crime journalism.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Shop clerk Clarence falls for a prostitute, steals a fortune in cocaine and goes on the run, pursued by psychotic mobster Vincenzo.

programme.title: The Loneliest Whale
programme.desc: The mysterious 52 Hertz whale emits a call unrecognized by other whales, leading to a life of solitude.

programme.title: Man on Wire
programme.desc: On August 7th 1974, at 7.15am, 24-year-old Frenchman Philippe Petit stepped off the edge of the South Tower of New Yorks World Trade Centre. Armed only with a balancing pole and intense determination, he walked out onto a single suspended wire and `danced for 45 minutes while balancing a quarter of a mile above the pavement below. The is the intimate story of Petit and his group of friends as they followed their dream.

programme.title: Dave Not Coming Back
programme.desc: A diver embarks on a long and dangerous mission to retrieve a dead body from a freshwater cave in South Africa.

programme.title: My Icon
programme.desc: Former Arsenal and France forward Thierry Henry speaks about the individuals that have been an inspiration to him over the course of his career.

programme.title: Music Box
programme.desc: An intimate exploration of Alanis Morissette and her groundbreaking 1995 album Jagged Little Pill.

programme.title: Becoming Madonna
programme.desc: Madonnas coming-of-age story is one of the greatest in entertainment history. This documentary film traces her transformation from insecure outsider to controversial star.

programme.title: Taylor Macs 24-Decade History of Popular Music
programme.desc: Concert film documenting New York icon Taylor Macs joyously queer 24-hour musical performance, charting the history of the US from 1776 to present day.

programme.title: 1972: Munichs Black September
programme.desc: Reconstructing the events leading up to the Munich Olympic massacre on September 5, 1972, from the viewpoints of the victims, the police, and the assassins.

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming (The Good Wife) embarks on a tour of the UK, uncovering the secrets of some of Britains cities. Beginning in London, he travels from St Pauls Cathedral to Soho.

programme.desc: A look at the life and career of Rex Harrison, the Oscar-winning English actor who starred as Professor Henry Higgins in the 1964 film musical My Fair Lady.

programme.title: The Directors

programme.title: Celtics City
programme.desc: As the Celtics and Lakers battle for basketball supremacy, Larry Bird and Magic Johnsons rivalry captivates the sports world; in 1986, Bird helps lead one of the most dominant seasons in NBA history, but an unthinkable tragedy changes everything.

programme.title: Celtics City
programme.desc: The tragic death of Len Bias casts a shadow over the Celtics, and Larry Birds style of play begins to take its toll; new rivals emerge with the Celtics going head-to-head with the Detroit Pistons in a heated 1987 playoff series; Bird retires.

programme.title: Busby
programme.desc: An intimate portrayal of former Manchester United manager Sir Matt Busby, a football icon who transformed the sport through a career of great talent - and tragedy.

programme.title: History of the Sitcom
programme.desc: Moms, dads, husbands, wives, brothers, sisters -- more than just a hilarious reflection of people to grow up and old with, sitcoms have opened the hearts of many to a more inclusive vision of what family can mean.

programme.title: History of the Sitcom
programme.desc: Work families can be even funnier than biological ones, since the endless array of wacky sitcom characters on the job offers hilarious insights into the state of the American workplace.

programme.title: Rise of the Superheroes
programme.desc: See how the tales of legendary comic book superheroes like Batman and The Avengers were adapted for cinema before going on to dominate Hollywood and captivate audiences worldwide.

programme.title: Pantani: The Accidental Death of a Cyclist
programme.desc: Filmmaker James Erskine documents Marco Pantanis battle with addiction after winning Tour de France and Giro dItalia in 1998 until his death from cocaine poisoning six years later.

programme.title: Gary
programme.desc: Following the extraordinary story of Gary Colemans rise to international fame as the child star of `Diffrent Strokes, his struggles with fame, and the controversy surrounding his tragic death at the age of 42. programme.title: The Truth vs. Alex Jones
programme.desc: Focuses on the aftermath of the 2012 Sandy Hook Elementary School shootings and the defamation lawsuit against conspiracy theorist Alex Jones.

programme.desc: A fascinating portrait of Yul Brynner, the Academy Award-winning actor famed for his roles as King Mongkut of Siam in The King and I and a robotic gunslinger in Westworld.

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: A deep dive into the life and career of the Academy Award-winning director, whose work includes `A Beautiful Mind, `Frost/Nixon and `Apollo 1.

programme.title: Celtics City
programme.desc: As the Celtics and Lakers battle for basketball supremacy, Larry Bird and Magic Johnsons rivalry captivates the sports world; in 1986, Bird helps lead one of the most dominant seasons in NBA history, but an unthinkable tragedy changes everything.

programme.title: Celtics City
programme.desc: The tragic death of Len Bias casts a shadow over the Celtics, and Larry Birds style of play begins to take its toll; new rivals emerge with the Celtics going head-to-head with the Detroit Pistons in a heated 1987 playoff series; Bird retires.

programme.title: Busby
programme.desc: An intimate portrayal of former Manchester United manager Sir Matt Busby, a football icon who transformed the sport through a career of great talent - and tragedy.

programme.title: History of the Sitcom
programme.desc: Moms, dads, husbands, wives, brothers, sisters -- more than just a hilarious reflection of people to grow up and old with, sitcoms have opened the hearts of many to a more inclusive vision of what family can mean.

programme.title: History of the Sitcom
programme.desc: Work families can be even funnier than biological ones, since the endless array of wacky sitcom characters on the job offers hilarious insights into the state of the American workplace.

programme.title: Rise of the Superheroes
programme.desc: See how the tales of legendary comic book superheroes like Batman and The Avengers were adapted for cinema before going on to dominate Hollywood and captivate audiences worldwide.

programme.title: Pantani: The Accidental Death of a Cyclist
programme.desc: Filmmaker James Erskine documents Marco Pantanis battle with addiction after winning Tour de France and Giro dItalia in 1998 until his death from cocaine poisoning six years later.

programme.title: Gary
programme.desc: Following the extraordinary story of Gary Colemans rise to international fame as the child star of `Diffrent Strokes, his struggles with fame, and the controversy surrounding his tragic death at the age of 42. An insight into Colemans private world through exclusive interviews with his fellow actors, industry insiders and his estranged ex-wife and parents.

programme.title: The Truth vs. Alex Jones
programme.desc: Focuses on the aftermath of the 2012 Sandy Hook Elementary School shootings and the defamation lawsuit against conspiracy theorist Alex Jones.

programme.title: Dublin Narcos
programme.desc: Documentary programme.

programme.title: Dublin Narcos
programme.desc: The story of how Dublin transformed from a recession-blighted city in the 1980s to a growing metropolis in the 1990s. As its fortune changed, so too did its criminals.

programme.title: Dublin Narcos
programme.desc: Cocaine explodes in popularity and crime reporter Veronica Guerin is shot in broad daylight by drug lords, sending shockwaves across the country.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: In Illinois, Robbie and Jersey get exclusive access to a former race car drivers stockpile where they uncover rare car parts, pristine toys, and epic stories from the racetrack.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.desc: Brandi is determined to actually win a locker for once in Santa Ana and has to show restraint to do it. Rene spots a stack of items in a locker that speaks to him. Kenny puts his needs out to the universe, while Barry struggles to stay in the game.

programme.title: Ramses: The Great King Of Ancient Egypt

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Some mysterious sticky goo starts appearing and gumming up things in Tickety Town. Tommy and Tallulah must figure out the source of the mystery goo and how to unstick Pufferty!

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Pufferty shows a real talent for doing dog train tricks. But, is he experienced enough to beat three older dog trains in the first ever Tickety Town Dog Train Contest?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Ronald and His Boulders
programme.desc: Ronald the rhinos favourite pastime is bashing boulders - but one day he realises there are no more boulders left to bash on the savannah. Ronald sets out to find something else to bash - with almost catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the House of Leaves
programme.desc: Nelson the elephant wants to build the biggest and best house of leaves ever. His nephew Nigel is eager to help out, but Nelson is worried that the leaf house might be too fragile for his exuberant young nephew. When the house of leaves comes crashing down, Nelson wastes no time in telling Nigel off.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Gertie the Goat
programme.desc: Gertie the goat has agreed to take Bao Bao the panda on a climbing expedition up the So Hi Mountains. The other animals advise Gertie against the trip, since pandas are not renowned for their climbing skills. Will Gertie and Bao Bao prove the others wrong, or will they need some help from their friends?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Jungle Ball
programme.desc: The Jungle Ball is imminent and all the animals are busy finding their dance partners for the night. All except Reginald - nobody has ever asked him to dance with them at the Jungle Ball. He sets off in search of a dance partner, but has he left it too late?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Great Rains
programme.desc: The savannah animals are busy preparing for the great rains, which are due any day. The rains flood the plains every year and they will have to take shelter on Blue Mountain. This year it is Giggles and Tickles turn to keep watch for the start of the rain.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: Nelson is in an inventive mood, and agrees to make various objects for his friends. Alan the aardvark is excited about the scooter that Nelson is making him - even though he doesnt really know what a scooter is. The other animals all take it in turns to help deliver the scooter to Alan, each making their own modifications to the vehicle on the way. Alan is delighted when his very own scooter eventually arrives.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Reginalds New Look
programme.desc: Nathalie the antelope decides to give Reginald the lion a makeover to refresh his look. She restyles him to such an extent that none of the other animals recognise him when he tries to alert them of an imminent danger. Will Reginald be able to lead his friends to safety in time?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: It is Washi-Washi day in the So Hi Mountains, when all the animals wash and groom themselves until they are squeaky and clean. While all the other animals are having fun getting clean, Horace the hare keeps making excuses not to join in. Can Horaces friends persuade him that bathing can be great fun?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Last Buluru Berry

programme.desc: When Madame Au Lait is called away to give Chikidee her ping pong lesson, Tommy and Tallulah bake a massive sticky carroty cake on their own. Ignoring the recipe, they make so much mixture that the oven explodes when they try to cook it, showering the whole town with sticky gunk and bringing Pufferty to a standstill! The race is on to free him before Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are having fun helping their friends, but dont stop first to ask what their friends need. So Lopsiloo finds herself on the wrong side of the bridge, the wrong goods are served in Battersbys shop and Puffertys favourite ball is thrown out when they tidy his kennel. It is only when they take McCogginss scooter away for cleaning that they finally realise the error of their ways.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Madame Au Lait is cleaning the clockhouse so Tommy and Tallulah take their jammy sandwiches to their room to eat. When some jam gets splodged on a blanket, they dont want to upset Madame Au Lait so they clean it themselves, but when they hang it out to dry on Pufferty, it floats off and lands in a muddy puddle! Whatever will Madame Au Lait say.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Chikidee is making slow but steady progress learning to fly, so Tommy and Tallulah try to help by making her a gigantic paper aeroplane. They dont realise, until its too late, that Chikidee cant control it and has no idea how to land! Chime Time is imminent but they cant leave their friend adrift in the sky. How can they talk her down safely?

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah offer to do the polishing so that Madame Au Lait can make their favourite fruity trifle. While she is out buying the ingredients, the twins go polish crazy, thinking that the more they use the happier Madame Au Lait will be and the more trifle she will make. The clockhouse is gleaming when Madame Au Lait returns, but when she sets a hoof on the floor she finds that it as slippery as an ice rink.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to collect McCogginss bell for a town performance. Despite Battersbys warning that the clapper is fragile and doesnt have a spare, Tommy and Tallulah manage to break it. Deciding that they must make a replacement, they look everywhere for something to use and try some very unusual options. Will the bell be ready for Chime Time?

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough journeys across the globe to discover how the earliest animals developed on our planet. Attenborough meets expert fossil hunters, and sees on-site some of the most remarkable finds that have transformed our understanding of the first animal life forms, including the first set of eyes and teeth and the first predators and parasites.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenboroughs journey continues in Canadas Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. Travelling on to North Africa, the rainforests of Australia and the east coast of Scotland, Attenborough discovers how animals evolved to conquer not only the oceans but also the land and air.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Right beneath our feet is a secret world of disguise and espionage, social networking and courtship, rape and pillage, parenthood and relationships. Sir David Attenborough investigates how macroscopic residents outwit their enemies to survive.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: In Vietnam, black-shanked douc Peter is fitted with a GPS collar before being released into the wild with his group and there are juicy melons for the spider monkeys.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Disabled chimp Chocolate has a new friend and everyones surprised by just who wants to be her pal.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia
programme.desc: This wild dog has been on Australias shores for at least three and a half thousand years and is believed to be descended from the Asian wolf.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth
programme.desc: In July, Arctic ice sheets crash into the sea while an arctic fox hunts among the rocks. In Africa, herds wildebeest cross the croc-infested Mara river.

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: As with humans, there are a lot of steps that go into successfully starting a family in the wild, from elaborate courtship techniques to complex mating habits and even lifelong love.

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: The moment that children first face the world can be daunting for baby and parent alike, and families doing their best to survive in the animal kingdom often share similar experiences.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild
programme.sub-title: The Everglades: The Season of Drought
programme.desc: In Southern Florida, a unique and complex ecosystem known as the Everglades has entered its winter season. Predator and prey are forced to live in close proximity due to a limited supply of water.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild
programme.sub-title: The Everglades: The Season of Flood
programme.desc: Waters flood Southern Floridas mangroves and marshes. Many of the 600 animal species that live in the Everglades disperse during this time, expanding their hunting and breeding grounds.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: S18/Ep7 - Its dental day for squirrel monkey Logan, but an all-over health check reveals another issue. While young female orangutan Mimi meets alpha male Tuan for the first time. (S18, ...

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison collects four male lemurs being rehomed at the park while baby orangutans Sibu and Kiwi enjoy a play session together.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.desc: Connecting with the three packs: the large Manzi pack in the lush heartland, the Kakuli pack in the Badlands, and the tiny Stork Colony pack living at the parks edge. Host Julz shares their victories and defeats in a make-or-break season of drought.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.desc: Rising temperatures mean that water is getting scarce and the Manzi pack must stand alongside predators to hydrate at a remaining precious water spot, Wekas pack hunts to feed the pups, and the Stork Colony pack thrive against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.desc: Agonising over a lost stork pack puppy, tussling with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, and figuring out noisy-neighbour, both friend and foe. Following a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the Badlands.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.desc: Dodging leopards with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. There is no such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Jules and Simon retreat from charging elephants.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.desc: Following a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill and watching for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks waiting for the rains to come.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.desc: An emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: A David Attenborough Special
programme.desc: On his 89th birthday, David Attenborough talks about his career, his recent record-breaking dive on the Great Barrier Reef and issues facing the natural world today.

programme.title: Wild Crusades
programme.desc: A team of wildlife filmmakers set out on a quest to film the elusive and rarely seen sloth bear to learn about its life and behaviours.

programme.title: Wild Crusades
programme.desc: An abandoned and ill elephant calf arrives, a victim of the growing battle for space and resources in Sri Lanka.

programme.title: Worlds Most Toxic Animals
programme.desc: In the South American rainforest, theres a tiny frog thats packed with poison. While near Sydney, Australia, youll meet the worlds most venomous spider.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Following the southern team as they test new migration tech and tools that could reduce shark attacks in a popular snorkelling spot. Catch and tag bull sharks with the northern team, who want to help local swimmers steer clear of birthing mothers.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild
programme.sub-title: The Everglades: The Season of Drought
programme.desc: In Southern Florida, a unique and complex ecosystem known as the Everglades has entered its winter season. Predator and prey are forced to live in close proximity due to a limited supply of water.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild
programme.sub-title: The Everglades: The Season of Flood
programme.desc: Waters flood Southern Floridas mangroves and marshes. Many of the 600 animal species that live in the Everglades disperse during this time, expanding their hunting and breeding grounds.

programme.title: Worlds Most Toxic Animals
programme.desc: In the South American rainforest, theres a tiny frog thats packed with poison. While near Sydney, Australia, youll meet the worlds most venomous spider.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Following the southern team as they test new migration tech and tools that could reduce shark attacks in a popular snorkelling spot. Catch and tag bull sharks with the northern team, who want to help local swimmers steer clear of birthing mothers.

programme.title: Hungry Games: Alaskas Big Bear Challenge
programme.desc: Stage 1 of the competition kicks off with seven ravenous bears post-hibernation; tiny Stomper vies for power and Blondies love, grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova and new mum BoldFace battles wolves.

programme.title: Hungry Games: Alaskas Big Bear Challenge
programme.desc: The Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits dash to cash on Julys salmon feast; BigBoi embarks on a food-finding road trip, QuadMom and RedBack are welcomed to the feast and BoldFace keeps her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: Hungry Games: Alaskas Big Bear Challenge
programme.sub-title: So Long and Thanks for All the Fish
programme.desc: An icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line; Big Boi bounces after a stumble before tragedy hits QuadMom; fan fave BoldFace hits her stride despite her clingy kid, Raccoon.

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: From the moment they take their precious first steps as babies, little ones face a great many difficulties and dangers across the animal kingdom as they strive to survive to adulthood.

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: Making our first friends is something we cant forget and its the same in the wild. Here, discover the importance of having allies and gaining trust in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire
programme.desc: Its the end of November in the Luangwa Valley, and the rains have just begun. It marks the end of one of the toughest dry season on record, and triggers a transition from parched wilderness to luscious wetland.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire
programme.desc: Its the end of November in the Luangwa Valley, and the rains have just begun. It marks the end of one of the toughest dry season on record, and triggers a transition from parched wilderness to luscious wetland.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire
programme.desc: Its the end of November in the Luangwa Valley, and the rains have just begun. It marks the end of one of the toughest dry season on record, and triggers a transition from parched wilderness to luscious wetland.

programme.title: Wild Canary Islands
programme.desc: When rocks engulfed by flames emerge from the middle of the ocean, new opportunities arise for the species that manage to reach them... This is the case of the Canary Islands, eight islands born from fire, that form an archipelago full of life.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. Theyve thus far made their way up Americas waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like its finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From Rattlesnakes to Cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are bring dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Weird, Wild and Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colourful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: The African migratory locust, hippopotamus, corpse flower, Malayan tapir and two-toed sloth all have one thing in common: they use stench as a survival strategy.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Ostriches, Inca terns, marabou storks, peacocks and hornbills have a range of amazing abilities that help them to survive with style.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Creatures that appear incapable of winning beauty competitions often have hidden depths, and some of the most extraordinary evolutionary stories to tell.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier Leagues greatest ever players.

programme.desc: Things have gone so well for the Trotters that Del and Rodney decide to treat Uncle Albert to a surprise birthday party. And Rodney has a night on the town with a date, but things dont quite go according to plan.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: After becoming millionaires, the Trotters find themselves owing a large amount of money to the Inland Revenue. Now Del Boy and family have only two weeks to find some cash or they will be evicted from Nelson Mandela House. To cap it all, Cassandra is about to give birth and Trigger is behaving even more oddly than usual.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Del, Rodney and Uncle Albert take their mates from the Nags Head on a disastrous day trip to Margate. A worried Cassandra is none too happy at Rodney joining the party having just celebrated their first anniversary.

programme.title: Men Behaving Badly
programme.desc: We see a glimpse of Christmas as it might have been for Gary, Tony, Dorothy and Deborah.

programme.title: The Fast Show
programme.desc: Ron Manager is confused by the concept of a female sports anchor person, Roger the middle-class football fan attempts to explain the offside rule, plus the 13th Duke of Wymbourne.

programme.title: The Fast Show
programme.desc: The Off Roaders go white-water rafting and Rowley Birkin presents a slide show, while Channel 9 present their version of the childrens fairytale classic, `The Singing, Ringing Tree. Arthur Atkinson features in a play written specially for him by Samuel Beckett, Dave Angel lets us in on his unusual hobby and Ralph makes a moving speech at a funeral.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Its been ten years since we last went to Billericay to spend Christmas with the Shipmans and the Wests.This year were off to Wales for the festivities, where Bryns cooking dinner for over thirteen people.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo completes his railway journey through the east of England during the post-war period. At RAF Lakenheath, he discovers a slice of America dropped into the British countryside, watching the US Air Forces Strike Eagles.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores the post-war Britain of his youth in a journey from the Midlands to the West Country. Beginning in Derbys railway works, Michael hears how the Victorian sheds now house some of the most modern assembly lines in Britain.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Coventry, Michael recalls the destruction by the German Luftwaffe of the citys gothic cathedral in November 1940. Heading south to Royal Leamington Spa, Michael visits the Guide Dogs for the Blind National Centre, established in the town in 1941.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos railway journey reaches the heart of Warwickshire. In the Tudor town of Stratford-upon-Avon, birthplace of William Shakespeare, Michael visits the Royal Shakespeare Theatre, home since 1961 to the Royal Shakespeare Company.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank are back and raring to go. Their first challenge is to find out whats inside a barn that has been closed off for years.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike finds a Pittsburgh time capsule, while Frank gets stuck into six generations of stuff on one of Michigans oldest farms.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys check out Aerosmiths original tour van, and Frank gets star-struck when he picks one of his teen idols.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry and Simon visit Sir Benjamin Slade as they search for more upcycling prospects. Simon converts a picture frame into a flat screen TV surround. Henry turns a quick profit on a tractor.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon OBrien find, fix and flog unwanted possessions. Henry and Simon realise profit potential in an old crop sprayer, a cast iron fire guard and old wooden workshop clamps.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: For some reason, the powers that be have given the inmates of Slade prison a weekend break to pursue their hobbies. Is this wise? Fletcher just wants to put his feet up in his cell with a good book, but others have different ideas as to how he should spend his time.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: A broken ankle provides Fletcher with a pleasant spell in the prison hospital. Fellow patient Blanco is convinced he is going to die, so he gives Fletcher a map showing where he buried an ill-gotten £8,000.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Godber takes up boxing and enters the prison championships and although he is the hot favourite to win, it is in several peoples interests that he be beaten.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Railway Collection
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah visits the Ffestiniog Railway, where he chats about restoration work and meets the manager, Paul Lewin, who also takes him for a ride down the track.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Railway Collection
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah fulfils a boyhood ambition driving one of the steam locos at Llangollen Railway and reminisces about days gone by with driver Robert Haslam.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Railway Collection
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah visits the Bluebell Railway in East Sussex. His first footplate ride of the day is on Fenchurch, where he is pleasantly surprised to meet a fire lady.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Railway Collection
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah visits Boness and Kinneil Railway and looks back at some of the restoration work thats been going on at the Ffestiniog Railway.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Railway Collection
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah visits the Midland Railway Centre in Derbyshire, is given a tour of the sheds and gets to have a go on the hydraulic riveter.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Railway Collection
programme.desc: Fred leaves Midland Railway and travels to Bridgenorth to the Severn Valley Railway. There he sees how a loco works looked back in the great age of steam.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to Northumberland to collect a rare 1975 NSU RO 80, Jack draws the short straw again with a Mini Mayfair stuck in a barn, and an Aston Martin DBS husk is auctioned.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Disaster strikes when the Naughty Lass collides with a low bridge on the Bumble Hole Canal Branch damaging a chimney.

programme.title: Guy Martin: Proper Jobs
programme.desc: Guy gets to grips with nature as a wildlife warden on the remote Calf of Man island.

programme.title: How Britain Worked
programme.desc: Guy has a dual task: to get a Yorkshire saw mill - Gayle Mill in Wensleydale - up and running again, and then use it to make a replica of one of the less-celebrated inventions of the Victorian era: the first pedal-powered bicycle. Using his engineering skills, Guy helps the restoration team repair the ingenious turbine thats needed to power the whole mill, but which is currently leaking 43 litres of water a second.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A vivid Dutch DAF 66 - in daffodil yellow - lands at the North Yorkshire showroom.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul heads out to collect a 1971 Jaguar E-Type and a 1933 Morgan three-wheeler Supersport. Before he can load up, he must negotiate a flock of chickens.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves in fast car heaven as he picks up a rare Subaru Impreza and an equally powerful Ford Escort RS Cosworth from North Wales.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rare 1968 Honda N600 car emerges from a lock-up in County Durham and Derek travels Scotland to collect an original RAC Bedford van.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Disaster strikes when the Naughty Lass collides with a low bridge on the Bumble Hole Canal Branch damaging a chimney.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: At the African and Caribbean Heritage Centre in Wolverhampton, Michael finds out about the impact of Enoch Powells 1968 speech on immigration. In Kidderminster, he discovers the site of a secret wartime enterprise known as the Drakelow Tunnels.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo is on the last leg of his railway journey from the train-building city of Derby to the aircraft manufacturing base of Filton. From Tewkesbury, he heads to the fairytale castle of Eastnor at the foot of the Malvern Hills.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys India
programme.desc: Joanna witnesses religious ceremonies in temples, and meets members of Indias transgender community.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys India
programme.desc: Joannas final leg of her journey takes her to Ranthambhore National Park, the mighty city of Delhi, and Dharamsala, where she is granted a private audience with the Dalai Lama.

programme.title: Trawlermen: Hunting the Catch
programme.desc: Off the coast of Yorkshire, Siwrengale is heading out for the beginning of the North Sea whelk season. Skipper Darren Warters is on the hunt with sons Regan and Lewis. Asian demand has created a lucrative fishery in this small patch of the North Sea, but winter storms have badly damaged their pots. Miles of rope must be untangled before they can begin fishing in earnest. South east of Shetland is Long Hole - the deepest waters in the North Sea.

programme.title: Trawlermen: Hunting the Catch
programme.desc: Scalloper Golden Promise is pushing force-6 winds to get to newly opening scallops beds ahead of his rivals. With the boat first to the grounds, they are in for a big pay day - but only once they cover the £8,000 fuel expenses to get here. Family-owned trawler Adenia leaves Lerwick aiming to land 1,000 tonnes of mackerel in Norway in just three days time.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul collects a cherished 1924 Rover 9 thats been in the same family since the 1950s and only had one previous owner before that.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads north to pick up a 1954 Morgan +4 coupe in mint condition and believed to be just one of three still on the road.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek waxes lyrical about a pristine Jaguar XJ8 and a Ford Model T van tests his driving skills.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: After missing out on an Austin Maestro, Gus and Will set their sights on another car on the sellers driveway. But can they convince him to do a deal?

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough takes a look at deserts, which cover a third of the Earths land surface. From space they appear lifeless but a closer look reveals a different picture.Deserts, in fact, are surprisingly varied; from Mongolias Gobi desert where wild Bactrian camels have to eat snow in lieu of water, to the Atacama in Chile where guanacos survive by licking the dew off cactus spines.

programme.title: Planet Earth II
programme.desc: Grasslands cover one quarter of all land and support the vast gatherings of wildlife, but to survive here animals must endure the most hostile seasonal changes on the planet. From Asias bizarre looking Saiga antelope, to the giant anteaters of Brazil, grassland animals have adapted in extraordinary ways to cope with these extremes.

programme.title: Planet Earth II
programme.desc: Cities are growing at a faster rate than any other habitat on Earth. They may seem an unlikely place for animals to thrive, but for the bold this is a world of surprising opportunity. Leopards prowl the streets of Mumbai, peregrine falcons hunt amongst New Yorks skyscrapers, and a million starlings perform spectacular aerial dances over Rome.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Revealing the extraordinary riches and wonders of the polar regions that have kept people visiting them for thousands of years. Today, their survival relies on a combination of ancient wisdom and cutting-edge science. Most Arctic people live in Siberia, either in cities like Norilsk - the coldest city on earth - or out on the tundra, where tribes like the Dogan survive by herding reindeer.

programme.title: Simon Reeves South America
programme.desc: Simon travels from Chiles Atacama Desert right down to Tierra Del Fuego, the most southerly inhabited place on Earth. The Atacama, one of the driest places on the planet, has as little as 1mm of rain per year.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green walks a beautiful but lesser-known route in the Douro Valley in Northern Portugal.
